text: Ijo (ga junrei no sadame)dearu. Arra no shinsei (na gishiki) o junshu suru mono wa,-nushi no omotode wa mottomo yoi monodearu. Sorekara kachiku wa, anata gata ni yomi kikasa reta mono o nozoki,(junrei-chu no shokuryo to shite) gohodearu. Sorede guzo no yogore kara hanare, kyogi no kotoba o sake nasai
